title.narrative: Creating Spaces to Take Action on Violence Against Women and Girls

description.narrative: The proposed five -year project (2016 -2021) will reduce violence against women and girls, including: the prevalence of early, child and forced marriage, through coordinated prevention and response initiatives that will directly reach 28915 targeted primary change agents in Bangladesh. The project will initiate Capacity development for targeted primary change agents, Establishing Community watch groups, Capacity development of the service providers, Linkages with the private sector for income generating works and engagement of the women and girls who experienced violence against women and girls, Monitoring services, Sharing experiences and learning, Policy advocacy, stronger networks and partnership will be a holistic approach of the project. This project will implement in nine upazilas from the districts of Dinajpur, Rangpur, Tangail, Netrokona, Faridpur & Dhaka.

participating-org.narrative: UN United Nations Children's Fund UNICEF

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

sector.narrative: Right to Equity: Gender and Diversity
